Text.Page:
Those wrecks were gula merchant ships. Should be full of boring stuff like rations, lumber, and grain. But we found a manifest that says there are gold coins in the cargo hold. Gold!

I know the sailors are all undead monsters now, but wouldn't you have grabbed the coins before you ran aground? Kill the {@LinkCreature:31#12#drowned gula sailors} and {@LinkCreature:31#14#bosuns} and see what they're carrying in their pockets!
Shiny! I can't give you all this gold for just helping, but here, I'll give you this!
Lucky gold coins! Shiny gold coins! Rich popori explorers!
